title.rendered: Seattle WIT User Group May 13th Happy Hour

content.rendered:
• Are you a Salesforce woman in technology or a supporter of Salesforce women in technology?
  • Are you located in the Greater Seattle area? 

If you answered yes to both of the questions above, you should register for the Seattle Women in Tech User group Happy Hour on Friday, May 13th here in Seattle.  That’s right, this Friday, the Seattle Women in Tech User Group is having an informal Happy Hour at the Diller Room in downtown Seattle.  You can kick back, have a drink, and connect with other Salesforce Women in Tech members from 5:00 – 7:00 pm.  

If you can’t make it to this event, make sure to ask to join our Chatter group on the Success Community so you can stay up to date on future events, and share you input on best times, days, and topics.

Register on Eventbrite

Join the Seattle Women in Tech Chatter Group

When: Friday, May 13, 2016 from 5:00 -7:00 pm

Where: The Diller Room, 1224 1st Ave, Seattle, WA 98101 (Across the street from the Seattle Art Museum on 1st & University)

jetpack-related-posts.title: Seattle WIT User Group June Event
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Join the amazing Salesforce women of Seattle to talk about the Summer '16 release, your favorite ideas to vote for, and the ideas you have to increase Salesforce usability.   Everyone is welcome Admins, End Users, Developers, Stakeholders, and anyone else that uses Salesforce in one way or another.  The…

jetpack-related-posts.title: These Women Love Salesforce — and Have Tattoos to Prove It
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: In 2017 my Ohana, Lauren Dunn, was visiting Seattle from Ireland, and what else would we do besides get Salesforce Tattoos!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Join Us For Automation Hour, a New Webinar Series!
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: If you are a Salesforce Admin, Developer, Analyst, Architect, or anyone else that does automation of anything in Salesforce, the new Salesforce Automation Hour is for you!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Join Me for Automation Hour w/ Meighan Brodkey 12/16/16
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Salesforce Automation Hour is a Webinar series to demonstrate all levels of declarative Automation inside Salesforce. Webinar Name: Salesforce Automation Hour -12/16/2016 Time: 12pm PST (3pm EST) Presenter: Meighan Brodkey Webinar Registration Link: https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/8207021249714603267 Find the webinar resources here. Make sure you join us on the Success Community!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Events 2020
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Salesforce Events 2020 is live!! That's right Ohana, it wouldn't be my blog if I wasn't talking about events and how we connect and get together as humans.  For real, we get out from behind the keyboard, and even leave the HOUSE!!! I know, it's crazy, but for Ohana,…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Native CMS
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Out of the box you you have 3 types of CMS, native CMS is one of those 3. Learn all about it from how to create articles, use cases, and why use Native CMS.
